Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Avatar Boulevard and Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Avatar Boulevard runs south out of the intersection with Hofton Avenue, which continues to the east and west. On the north, you can see the magnificent City Walls, which protect the citizens of Oceancrest from any and all attacks or sieges which might be launched against the city.
